aws_ebs_snapshot.description: Provides an elastic block storage snapshot resource.

volume_id.description: The Volume ID of which to make a snapshot.

description.description: A description of what the snapshot is.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the snapshot

owner_id.description: The AWS account ID of the EBS snapshot owner.

owner_alias.description: Value from an Amazon-maintained list (`amazon`, `aws-marketplace`, `microsoft`) of snapshot owners.

volume_size.description: The size of the drive in GiBs.

kms_key_id.description: The ARN for the KMS encryption key.

data_encryption_key_id.description: The data encryption key identifier for the snapshot.

tags.description: A map of tags for the snapshot.
